message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
```java
Random rand = new Random();
int[][] array = new int[10][10];
int count1 = 0, count2 = 0;
for(int i = 0; i < array.length; i++){
    for(int j = 0; j < array[i].length; j++){
        if(count1 == count2){
            array[i][j] = rand.nextInt(2);
            if(array[i][j] == 0) count1++;
            else count2++;
        }else if(count1 > count2){
            array[i][j] = 1;
            count2++;
        }else{
            array[i][j] = 0;
            count1++;
        }
    }
}
```
<<<explanation>>>: This code creates a 2D array and fills it with 0s and 1s. It uses a random number generator to decide whether to place a 0 or a 1 at each position in the array. However, it also keeps track of how many of each number it has placed in the array so far. If it has placed more of one number than the other, it will place the other number to keep the counts even. If the counts are equal, it will choose a number at random. This ensures that the final array will have an equal number of 0s and 1s.
